text: If you live in Florida, DeKlantis is reclassifying COVID-19 deaths as just plain flu deaths.  He is actively misleading the people of Florida to appease the racist Trump & people just want to go to the beach of their night clubs.  I expect a new COVID-19 spike within two weeks.
